books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: Heartbeats quicken and neurons fire when a pair of antagonistic scientists work together on a project.
books.name: LOVE ON THE BRAIN

books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The 13th book in the Mercy Thompson series. The disappearance of the vampire Wulfe and others might indicate the return of the Harvester.
books.name: SOUL TAKEN

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
books.name: NOVEMBER 9

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: U.S. Marshal Andrea Oliver goes to Longbill Beach to protect a judge and winds up investigating a cold case from 1982.
books.name: GIRL, FORGOTTEN

books.author: by William Kent Krueger
books.description: The 19th book in the Cork O’Connor mystery series. Cork uses his skills as a hunter to track mercenaries and confronts his own self-doubt.
books.name: FOX CREEK

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.
books.name: FIRE AND BLOOD

books.author: by Ilona Andrews
books.description: The sixth book in the Hidden Legacy series.
books.name: RUBY FEVER

books.author: by Ashley Flowers with Alex Kiester
books.description: A journalist who returns to her hometown vows to find a missing girl and solve a 20-year-old cold case.
books.name: ALL GOOD PEOPLE HERE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: When his ex-girlfriend turns up dead in his office building, an entry-level investment analyst delves into the halls of economic power.
books.name: THE 6:20 MAN

books.author: by R.F. Kuang
books.description: In 1828, Robin Swift studies at Oxford University’s Royal Institute of Translation and faces a choice when Britain pursues a war with China.
books.name: BABEL
